then.openNewWindow: Failed to copy, opening a new window to show text.

login.heroExplanation: With BangumiN, you can safely post spoilers in consideration of others, and view data visualization for users and subjects in the way you want.
login.signInUsingBangumiNotice: 1. By clicking login, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy
login.signUpBangumiNotice: 2. BangumiN is not affiliated to Bangumi, after signing up you need to go back to BangumiN to log in

waitForBangumiAuth.title: Login in progress
waitForBangumiAuth.content: Please complete the login process in the newly opened window, please don't close this window before login is completed.

login.alreadyLoggedIn: You already logged in, redirecting to the homepage
login.loginFailure: Login failed, please try again later.
login.waitForActivationPrompt: Activation in progress, this window will be closed shortly.
login.promptUserToCLoseWindow: Click here or in-app browser close button

welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.subHeading: See what you can do with BangumiN

stats.title: Statistics
stats.content: Check your tailored statistics on BangumiN: Distribution of your score, historical data... and more

spoilerBox.title: Spoiler Box
spoilerBox.content: Post your spoilers with masks, then safely share your spoilers to Twitter, Weibo... or wherever you want

search.title: Search
search.content: Search for a subject or a user, then check the statistics. You can also manage your subject collection status on Bangumi.
search.learnMore: Start searching using the top search bar

settings.name: Settings
settings.description: All changes will be saved automatically

BangumiLanguage.name: Show bangumi info in
BangumiLanguage.explanation: Won't work if relevant translation is not available on Bangumi

showA11YViolationTheme.name: Show themes that violate accessibility guidlines

tooltip.explanation: Some themes(like Bangumi's Pink theme) violate accessibility guideline, some people (i.e. have a visual impairment? might have difficulty in using them. These theme options are hidden by default. By toggling this slider you confirm that you've read relevant explanations.

empty.all: It looks like you don't have any in-progress collections, try to add some first!
empty.subType: It looks like you don't have any in-progress collections under this type, try to add some first!

modal.title: Edit collection
modal.tags: Tags(Use Space, Comma or Enter key to addï¼Œup to {{tagsMaxNumber}})

tags.tagsMaxNumber: {{tagsCurrentNumber}}/{{tagsMaxNumber}} tags are added, You can only add up to to {{tagsMaxNumber}}

spoilerBox.name: Spoiler Box
spoilerBox.headline: {{name}}'s spoiler box
spoilerBox.emptySpoilerBoxPrompt:
There's no spoilers.

Click add to create your first spoiler. When you do, spoilers will show up here.

guideDialog.title: How do I use Spoiler Box?
guideDialog.content:
1. Click add on the right bottom corner to pop up the dialog.


2. (Required) Enter your spoiler, use visibility_off to select the highlight text that you want to hide.


3. (Optional) Tag related subjects


4. After posting, click more_horiz on the card to share.

deletionDialog.title: Are you sure that you want to delete this spoiler?

guestPrompt.message: This spoiler is sent through BangumiN. With BangumiN, you can safely share your spoilers with others.

toolbar.visibilityOn: Clear spoiler mark for selected text

tagSubject.name: Enter and select the subject that you want to spoil(Maximum: {{maximumCount}})

explanation.subject: Last time BangumiN captured new data for this subject: {{time}}. Data is updated on a monthly basis so delay might happen. This time won't be updated if there's no new record.
explanation.user: Last time BangumiN captured new data for this user: {{time}}. Data is updated on a monthly basis so delay might happen. This time won't be updated if there's no new activity.

body.content:
About BangumiN

BanguminN (read as Bangu-min or Bangumi-N) is an app which focuses on data visualization and spoiler share.
The code of BangumiN is open-sourced under MIT license, welcome to contribute.

Development Team

Astrea
Andrew

Contact us

Github Issues or bangumin!protonmail*com (PGP key, ! -> @?* -> .)

tos.content:
BangumiN Terms of Service

1. Terms

By accessing the website at https://bangumin.tv, you are agreeing to be bound bythese terms of service, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance withany applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessingthis site. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.

2. Use License

  1. Permission is granted to temporarily view the materials (information or software) on BangumiN'swebsite for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer oftitle, and under this license you may not:
    1. modify or copy the materials in unauthorized way;
    2. use the materials for any commercial purpose;
    3. attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on BangumiN's website;
    4. transfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server;
    5. perform actions on the site or members of the site that are harmful or in violation of any applicable law.
  2. This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated byBangumiN at any time.

3. Disclaimer

  1. The materials on BangumiN's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. BangumiN makes no warranties, expressed orimplied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warrantiesor conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual propertyor other violation of rights.
  2. Further, BangumiN does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, orreliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any siteslinked to this site.
  3. Contents that're not generated by BangumiN users are from Bangumi(https://bgm.tv/about/copyright), we're notaware of contents on Bangumi, and related copyright issues should be redirected to Bangumi.

4. Limitations

In no event shall BangumiN or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages forloss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials onBangumiN's website, even if BangumiN or a BangumiN authorized representative has been notified orally or in writingof the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, orlimitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

5. Accuracy of materials

The materials appearing on BangumiN's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors.BangumiN does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete or current. BangumiN maymake changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. However BangumiN does not makeany commitment to update the materials.

6. Links

BangumiN has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of anysuch linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by BangumiN of the site. Use of any suchlinked website is at the user's own risk.

7. Modifications

BangumiN may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website youare agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

8. Governing Law

These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the local laws of the websiteadministrator and you irrevocablysubmit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location.

This Terms of Service is effective as of 21 September 2018.

privacy.content:
Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. It is BangumiN's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, https://bangumin.tv, and other sites we own and operate.

We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we're collecting it and how it will be used.

We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we'll protect within acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorised access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.

When accessing BangumiN, your request history (including but not limited to ip address, request time, behavior, information that stores in localstorage, cookies or other locations we have access to.) may be recorded by us and used to improve our website services. In addition, we use Google Analytics to analyze user behavior.

We don't share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law or in extreme situations.

Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.

You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.

Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us.

This policy is effective as of 21 September 2018.

body.explanation: Users who are using other browsers/platforms may still use BangumiN, however full functionality is not guaranteed and we won't provide support or fix bugs that require non-trivial actions.
